statements: UPDATE meetings SET organizer='John Doe', attendees='["Alice","Bob"]' WHERE meeting_id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE meetings SET meeting_date='2022-08-15', agenda='Discuss project updates', meeting_time='14:30:00' WHERE organizer='Alice';

UPDATE meetings SET meeting_date = '2022-09-15', meeting_time = '14:00:00', agenda = 'Discuss project updates', attendees = '{"John Doe", "Jane Smith"}' WHERE meeting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
